Class BTOProjectsView

java.lang.Object
sg.edu.ntu.sc2002.ay2425.fcsdGroup2.views.BTOProjectsView
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserView
public class BTOProjectsView extends Object implements UserView
Represents the view for managing BTO Projects. Allows creation, editing, deletion, viewing, and management of BTO projects.

    • viewAllProjects

      public void viewAllProjects(BTOProjsController projsController, HDBBTOExerciseController exerciseController)
      Displays all BTO Projects in the system, regardless of manager or visibility. Allows selecting and managing a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projsController - controller for BTO projects
      exerciseController - controller for BTO exercises

    • viewMyProjects

      public void viewMyProjects(BTOProjsController projsController, HDBBTOExerciseController exerciseController)

      exerciseController - controller for BTO exercises

    • manageBTOProject

      public void manageBTOProject()
      Handles the management options for BTO Projects: viewing all projects, viewing own projects, or returning.

    • manageSelectedProject

      public void manageSelectedProject(BTOProj selected)
      Manages further actions on a selected project such as toggling visibility, managing officers, and managing applications.
      Parameters:
      selected - the selected BTO project

    • manageOfficerByProjectId

      public void manageApplicationsByProjectId(ApplicationController applicationController, int projectId)

      Parameters:
      applicationController - the application controller
      projectId - the ID of the project
